Using this saved state, I was actually able to slaughter the 
final "please register" level in the demo version.  The stats for 
these characters are insanely high.  Just copy the following file 
into your /glad/ directory:

http://thespiff.com/SAVE2.GTL

Be warned: this saved state will replace whatever saved game you had 
saved in the #2 save slot.
